org.apache.spark.graphx

Interface LocalSparkContext

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConnectedComponentsSuite, EdgeRDDSuite, GraphGeneratorsSuite, GraphOpsSuite, GraphSuite, LabelPropagationSuite, PageRankSuite, PregelSuite, ShortestPathsSuite, StronglyConnectedComponentsSuite, SVDPlusPlusSuite, TriangleCountSuite, VertexRDDSuite

    public interface LocalSparkContext
    Provides a method to run tests against a SparkContext variable that is correctly stopped after each test.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T> T withSpark(scala.Function1<SparkContext,T> f)
      Runs `f` on a new SparkContext and ensures that it is stopped afterwards.

    • Method Detail

      • withSpark
